name: Tumblr - Earth's View
description: A new Tumblr theme; and yes, it's another space one.
additional_info:
v1.2:
Edited "Search" box.
Fixed colours on the new layout.

v1.1:
Changed colour of Post Control buttons (the "Share", "Reblog" and "Like" buttons). 

v1.0:
Initial release.

-Multiple transparency and colour alterations.
